Description:
WELCOME HOME!!!! AFFORDABLE DOUBLE STOREY
Excellent opportunity to purchase this beautiful double storey home within walking distance to schools, shops, transport and parks.
Featuring:
formal entrance hallway leading to a spacious hostess kitchen, adjoining spacious meals with access to an Alfresco, large living room, huge rumpus room, 4 fantastic size bedrooms, two separate master bedrooms with dual access each to a bathroom, roomy laundry, two powder rooms, double remote garage with internal access and drive through access to a huge workshop.
Extras: ducted heating, alarm system, verticals, gas hot plates, wall oven, high ceilings throughout, low maintenance landscaped gardens finishes off this comfortable home.
For inspection please call: Romeo Sassine 0411 882 605.
Romeo Sassine : 0411 882 605

Description:
PRIME PARK FRONT LOCATION
Elegantly designed with a contemporary aesthetic, this Henley built superb four bedroom family home located opposite to a park in Arcadia estate, delivers sumptuous proportions filled with light, fabulous entertaining and family spaces.
This brilliant home will suit a multitude of buyers, with open plan living, low maintenance gardens and functional floor plan that flows effortlessly.
As you enter you will be impressed by the space and quality this home offers.
Featuring:
- Large master bedroom with en-suite and walk in robe
- Formal living room
- Ducted heating & evaporative cooling
- Double garage with internal access
- Quality blinds
The open plan kitchen alone has an abundance of features including:
-400mm Caesarstone stone bench tops
-Butler's Pantry
-Extended benchtop with breakfast bar
-Stainless steel appliances, including microwave
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!

Description:
CLOSE TO EVERYTHING
Positioned in the highly sought-after Arcadia Estate is this well presented four-bedroom home perfect for the first home buyer or savvy investor. Admittedly, located near easy access to the Freeway, Cardinia Station, local schools and the Arena & Lakeside shopping precincts. The accommodation on offer includes four generous-sized bedrooms with a master which includes walk in robe and full ensuite. A spacious open plan meal and living area spills out onto a low maintenance backyard. The convenience of ducted heating, air conditioning and a remote double garage with internal access, makes this the ideal family home or addition to the investment portfolio. Currently leased for $1581.66 per calendar month till March 2021.
** INSPECTION PROCEDURE: **
In light of the current COVID-19 situation, this property may be inspected by private appointment only. We have implemented safety procedures for the wellbeing of all. These include social distancing, use of hand sanitisers and no unnecessary hand contact with surfaces within the property. To comply with restrictions only 1-2 individuals will be allowed to enter a property at one time. Parties of 3 or more will be declined access.
** Please discuss with us any concerns you may have before arriving at the inspection **
Internal area
220m²

Description:
Great Family Home in a Superb Location!!
This brand-new home located on an approx. 412m2 allotment in Grandvue estate Officer, this quality built home would be ideal for the growing family in or an investor. Some of the features are:
-Four spacious bedrooms
- Luxury master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe
-Other 3 bedrooms with Built-in-robes
-Two Spacious living areas including family/dining
-Spectacular kitchen featuring oversized Caesar stone bench top, 900 mm stainless steel upright cooktop, Glass splashback & walk-in pantry
-Decent size backyard ideal for pets and kids to play.
-Remote controlled double lockup garage with internal access.
-Other features include high ceilings, ducted heating, double vanity in ensuite and much more.....
In close proximity to the Arena shopping complex, public transport, well-regarded schools, including St Francis Xavier College and the M1 freeway making the commute to the CBD a breeze. This property needs to be on your list this week to inspect! Don't wait... Call Vandana -0423 894 812 today for a private inspection and make your dreams come true. (Please note Map shows Sandalford Cres which has been renamed Petaluma Cres)
If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the FHOG and stamp duty savings
**To book an appointment to view this property, please click on the "Book an inspection" button and register your details and we will instantly respond to you with available inspection times. You MUST register, or the appointment time may not go ahead. If no appointment time is available, please register and we will notify you as soon as a time becomes available. **

Description:
Living the easy life!
Situated in the ever popular Arcadia Estate, this home is only minutes to all amenities including Arena Shopping Centre, Lakeside Square Shopping Centre, restaurants, medical centres, parks, schools and all public transport.
Inside the home you will find 3 bedrooms with the master featuring walk in robe and ensuite, the 2 remaining spacious bedrooms with mirrored built in robes which are serviced by a family bathroom with separate toilet. Forward facing to the home, is a study or kids retreat area.
The open plan living features a modern kitchen with ample cupboard space, built in pantry, stainless steel appliances and dishwasher which oversees the family room and dining. Sliding door access leads outside to a private and low maintenance backyard - which is the perfect size to just sit back and relax.
Additional benefits include ducted heating, split system cooling, double remote garage with internal access, downlights throughout, oversized laundry and so much more!
Whether you are a first home buyer, downsizer or savvy investor, this home will appeal to all!
** INSPECTION PROCEDURE: **
In light of the current COVID-19 situation, this property may be inspected by private appointment only. We have implemented safety procedures for the wellbeing of all. These include social distancing, use of hand sanitisers and no unnecessary hand contact with surfaces within the property. To comply with restrictions only 1-2 individuals will be allowed to enter a property at one time. Parties of 3 or more will be declined access.
** Please discuss with us any concerns you may have before arriving at the inspection **

Description:
BAYVIEW RISE ESTATE
Bayview Rise Estate Officer is an ideal opportunity to live and enjoy all that the township of Officer provides
Abundant quality schools, most within walking distance from the estate
Modern, well equipped recreation facilities including sporting ovals, tennis and netball courts, walking paths and local parks
Excellent transport options railway station, bus stops, freeway access
Local and regional shopping Arena Shopping Centre, Lakeside, Fountain Gate, Village Centre, Marketplace, Berwick and Beaconsfield strip shopping
Medical facilities are located locally in Office, Pakenham Lakeside, Beaconsfield and Berwick. There are hospitals located in Berwick St John Of God and Casey
The blocks available are ranging in size from 300m2 through to 537m2

Description:
THE PERFECT SPOT FOR YOUR HOME Timbertop Estate
Option 1 Build your design Home
Location synonymous with style in the coveted Timbertop Estate, design excellence and lifestyle ease, this premier 740sqm (20m x 37m) approx. rectangular allotment is titled and ready to build your dream abode. Brilliantly planned to promote a dream setting for families and those seeking an unbeatable lifestyle. Timbertop is one of the few residential areas in Officer located inside the Berwick School Zone, which means a great choice of both public and private education options.
There's a primary school just a few hundred metres from the estate, with two more schools under construction, including a specialty education school and a secondary school. Quality preschool and higher education options are also in easy reach. If your kids are into Sports such as tennis, hockey, football, cricket, netball, soccer, basketball, volleyball..the list goes on. The Gin Gin Bin Reserve is proposed to include a floodlit football/cricket oval with cricket nets and netball court. The Officer and McMullen reserves on the Princes Highway will include floodlit cricket/football ovals, 10 netball courts, 6 tennis courts and 4 soccer pitches and there are plans for basketball, hockey and volleyball facilities.
A very easy and quick access to Public transport, freeways, medical facilities, schools, Beaconsfield Town and Berwick Village.
Option 2 Choose one of our House and Land Packages
MONT ALBERT
French Provincial masterpiece. 52 squares of pure opulence. A luxurious master suite, guest rooms with walk in robes and ensuites to both levels. All other bedrooms with walk in robes. Designed with Feng Shui consideration for the perfect layout to suit every lifestyle in pure luxury.
For more information, please check the link below: https://www.oakliving.com.au/home-designs/mont-albert/

Description:
INVESTORS LOOK HERE !
From the outset you will love the classic modern facade surrounded by low maintenance gardens.
The tailored floor plan has been designed to give a sense of space and on entry you will notice the wide entrance hall and high ceilings.
Walking through and into the main living and dining zone you will be impressed with the open plan design as well as sliding doors that lead out onto the under cover alfresco and fully landscaped backyard, giving plenty of room to entertain and relax.
The gourmet kitchen is located at the heart of the home and includes waterfall stone benchtop, stainless steel appliances and an abundance of storage space.
The master bedroom boasts WIR and full en-suite and additional bedrooms are conveniently located at a separate wing of the home and include BIR's and are serviced by the main bathroom.
Added features include but are not limited to laundry, ducted heating, LED downlights, remote controlled double garage and much more !
Located in the Arcadia Estate and just minutes away from Bridgewood Primary School, Officer Secondary College, Cardinia Road and Officer Train Station, Comely Banks Recreation Reserve ( under construction ) and Officers New Town Centre. Not to mention established parklands, walking tracks and beautiful lakes and wetlands.
Currently leased until 15/05/2021 at $1803 per month with potential to extend for a fixed term.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
** Please be advised due to Stage 4 Covid 19 restrictions we're unable to conduct Private Inspections until further notice, but we encourage you to register your interest now so we contact you immediately to arrange a private inspection once restrictions are lifted**

Description:
BAYVIEW RISE ESTATE
Bayview Rise Estate Officer is an ideal opportunity to live and enjoy all that the township of Officer provides
Abundant quality schools, most within walking distance from the estate
Modern, well equipped recreation facilities including sporting ovals, tennis and netball courts, walking paths and local parks
Excellent transport options railway station, bus stops, freeway access
Local and regional shopping Arena Shopping Centre, Lakeside, Fountain Gate, Village Centre, Marketplace, Berwick and Beaconsfield strip shopping
Medical facilities are located locally in Office, Pakenham Lakeside, Beaconsfield and Berwick. There are hospitals located in Berwick St John Of God and Casey
The blocks available are ranging in size from 300m2 through to 537m2

Description:
Start A Winning Life At Winland!
Only 45 minutes from Melbourne CBD, enjoy easy access to train station and Monash Freeway, surrounded by a wide range of quality schools, and local amenities. Officer is fast becoming one of the most sought-after suburbs in the South East Growth Corridor for first home buyers and investors.
Peake Real Estate Proudly present Winland Estate one of the finest in Officer:
Only minutes from Officer Precinct
Easy access to Beaconsfield Station and Officer Station
3 minutes to Monash Freeway
Timbertop Café at your doorstep
Adjoining to proposed Government school and sports reserve
Blocks range from 250m2 - 519m2 approx.
Majority of blocks with 12.5m and 14 m frontages
Stage 1 expected to title late 2020
On offer is a 340m2 (approx.) allotment, with 12.5 metre frontage. This generous size fits majority of modern floor plans from major builders. Bus stop and freeway are excess are all within an arm's reach. Take advantage of low deposit and long settlement. Whether you are first home buyers, investors or downsizers, you are always a winner at Winland Estate.
80% of Stage 1 now SOLD! Construction will start from April 2020.
Start your winning life by contacting Brix Cai today on 0433 925 529 for inspection and more information.

Description:
EXCEPTIONAL FAMILY ENTERTAINER - 616m2
** We are still here to help, EMAIL or SMS to register your interest and will notify you for inspection availabilities also available VIDEO TOUR on request. Best Regards Lincoln Scott 0423 486 285 **
This exceptional family entertainer will tick all the boxes for your growing family! Including 4 separate living areas & a huge backyard for the kids to play, this quality 3 year old home built by the award winning Metricon Homes is perfectly situated in the Park Central Estate in Officer on a rare 616m2 corner block.
Boasting 4 spacious bedrooms & leisure upstairs, the master bedroom includes a generous walk in robe & deluxe ensuite with double vanity and oversized shower. Upon entry you will find a fully equipped theatre room/optional study for enjoying those quiet nights in, separate lounge room, all flowing out to a lovely light filled family/meals area which surrounds the stunning open plan kitchen with ceaser stone benches, tiled splash backs, stainless steel appliances and adjoining walk in pantry with internal access from the garage. Last but not least, enjoy the oversized alfresco year-round with café blinds and open fire place all overlooking the rare large back yard, giving you room for the trampoline, garden shed & side access through double gates for the boat or caravan. Added comforts include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double lock up garage with internal access, down stairs powder room, 2nd bathroom, down lights, timber floors & much much more.
Amenities close by include:
- Bridgewood Primary School, Officer Secondary School, Maranatha Cristian School.
- Officer Train Station & easy Freeway access
-.Parklands and walking tracks.
- DAngelos award winning Winery and Restaurant.
- Officer and Beaconsfield shopping hubs.
Insights: First listed on 21 September, this house has been on Domain for 30 days (last updated on 21 September). It was last sold in 2016 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.
